english.segment1: Take my heart I lay it down. At the feet of You who is crowned. And take my life I'm letting go. I lift it up to You, who is throned
english.segment2: Take my fret take my fear. All I have I'm leaving here. Be all my hopes be all my dreams. Be all my delights be my everything. be my everything
english.segment3: And I will worship. You Lord only You Lord. And I will bow down. Before You only You Lord. Only You Lord
english.segment4: Take my heart I lay it down. At the feet of You Who's crowned. And take my life I'm letting go. I lift it up to You, to you Who is throned. to you Who is throned Jesus
english.segment5: And it's just You and me here now. And It's just You and me here now. And it's just You and me Lord. It's just You and me Lord. It's just You and me here now
